name: Uxbrain
tagline: uxAPP engine For Rapid Developing android Application
body:
### introducing uxbrain.
UXBrain is a library for Rapid Developing android applications , You can simply use pre-writen functions and widgets in this library for rapid developing your apps,main Golas are :

```
Rapid Development
Single and Friendly known UI for Persian apps
Single user Log-in in all apps
```

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.

### Classes
this Library has multiple Built in classes you can use for developing Your applications 

### Authors and Contributors
main developer of this library is Arash Rasoulzadeh(@darkeliden)
 

### Support or Contact
UXapp Team Website : Http://www.uxapp.ir
Support Email : support@uxapp.ir
